name: 0-Introduction
content:
DATA QUALITY FEATURES


This project ensures robust data reliability through automated workflows leveraging tools like Sparkflows Custom Nodes, Great Expectations and Data Quality Rules dashboards. It encompasses data profiling to uncover patterns, rule-based validation for accuracy, and statistical analysis to identify correlations. The system delivers actionable insights to maintain compliance, improve dataset integrity, and streamline data quality operations.  


#1. Data Profiling

Analyze datasets to understand structure, patterns, and anomalies.  

Workflows:  

  • Customer-Data - Data Profile (ID: 2478): Generates comprehensive profile reports for customer data.  
  • Data-Profiling-On-Employee-Dataset (ID: 1290): Executes data profiling to assess employee dataset integrity.  
  • Correlation-Summary-Validation (ID: 1291): Produces correlation summaries for dataset validation.  


#2. Data Quality

Validate data against predefined rules to ensure accuracy and reliability.  

Workflows:  

  • Customer-Data - Data Quality (ID: 2448): Applies validation rules to customer data for consistency checks.  


#3. GreatExpectations

Implement automated data testing using the Great Expectations framework.  

Workflows:  

  • Using-Great-Expectations-Nodes (ID: 1293): Demonstrates integration of Great Expectations nodes into workflows.  
  • Read-Flat-File-Apply-Great-Expectations-Rules (ID: 1292): Validates flat-file data against Great Expectations suites.  
  • Performing-Data-Quality-On-Housing-Data (ID: 1294): Executes data quality checks on housing datasets using Great Expectations.  


#4. ValidationNode  

Execute data cleaning and quality checks through specialized validation nodes.  

Workflows:  

  • Performing-Data-Cleaning-And-Data-Quality-On-Employee-Dataset (ID: 1289): Combines data cleaning and quality validation for employee data.  


#5. SCALA NODES (TBD)  

Execute cscsfsfs.  

Workflows:  

- CCCCCCCC.
description: Automating data profiling, validation, and quality assurance across customer, employee, and housing datasets.
